jd_information.description: Travel Consultant require for company located at Khar.Only Female CandidatesWith 1 to 4 years experienceJob Description :1. Handling all the functions related to Booking to Ticket issuance, Re-issuance, Cancellations & Refunds.2. Handle GDS Queues, Calls, and emails.3. Making and confirming flight itinerary, hotel accommodation and transportation for business travelers.4. Attend and be accountable for customer queries and communications.5. Motivate the team and keep team updated on travel regulations, policies and developments.6 Handel Holiday Packages Domestic & InternationalSalary up to 18,000 /- pm Immediate Joining requireinterested candidates forward updated cv on soniahrpandit@gmail.comor call on  7021132857 Thanks & Regards,Sonia
